name: AVAssetImageGenerator.ApertureMode
desc: The aperture modes used when generating images.

items.name: static let cleanAperture: AVAssetImageGenerator.ApertureMode
items.desc: Both pixel aspect ratio and clean aperture will be applied.

items.name: static let encodedPixels: AVAssetImageGenerator.ApertureMode
items.desc: Neither pixel aspect ratio nor clean aperture will be applied.

items.name: static let productionAperture: AVAssetImageGenerator.ApertureMode
items.desc: Only pixel aspect ratio will be applied.

items.name: init(rawValue: String)
items.desc: Creates an aperture mode with a string value.
